public void write()
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  java.lang.Exception
Write the xml RCML-document in the RCML-file. Limit the number of entries to the value maximalNumberOfEntries (2maxNumberOfRollbacks(configured)+1)

                       long time)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       java.lang.Exception
Write a new entry for a check out or a check in the RCML-File made by the user with identity at time

Parameters:
type - co for a check out, ci for a check in
identity - The identity of the user
time - Time at which the check in/out is made
